abstract: The Madoff trustee has demanded the return of $7 billion he says Jeffry M. Picower and his wife withdrew from their accounts over decades.
snippet: The Madoff trustee has demanded the return of $7 billion he says Jeffry M. Picower and his wife withdrew from their accounts over decades.
lead_paragraph: Jeffry M. Picower, a longtime investor in Bernard L. Madoff’s fraud scheme who died in his Palm Beach swimming pool last month, left an estate with assets far in excess of $1 billion  and that could be a spot of good news for Mr. Madoff’s victims.

headline.main: Trustee Seeks Billions for Madoff Investors
headline.print_headline: Trustee May Win Billions For Investors In Madoff
